before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"elarm","text":"Adherent cells are prone to peeling, and hence, addition and removal of any liquid should be performed slowly with care.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3cqi3","text":"","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2olic","text":"At no point during the entire procedure prior to mounting should the sample be left to dry. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5dnu0","text":"","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"h16a","text":"Fluorescent-dye conjugated Secondary Antibodies are light-sensitive and hence should always be protected from light.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b1nqh","text":"","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bhdtc","text":"All PBS washes should be at least 10 mins, and plates are left to incubate on the bench at room temperature.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"9o7js","text":"This protocol describes the immunocytochemistry of the iPSC-derived corticostriatal culture on fluid-walled dumbbells. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"2e0s0","text":"Reagents:","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6djup","text":"Citrate buffer solution, pH 6.0 (Sigma- Aldrich, SKU# C9999-100ML)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":23}],"data":{}},{"key":"4q4s9","text":"Donkey Serum (Sigma- Aldrich, SKU# D9663-10ML)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":12}],"data":{}},{"key":"7tcqp","text":"PBS with Azide (Insight Biotechnology, CA# sc-296028)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":14}],"data":{}},{"key":"dlv39","text":"Paraformaldehyde (PFA) (Sigma- Aldrich, CAT#P6148)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":0,"length":16}],"data":{}},{"key":"b1mkl","text":"Triton X-100 (Sigma- Aldrich, SKU# X100)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":4,"offset":0,"length":12}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"9C8B06B0E2A111EDAF7C0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.sigmaaldrich.com/GB/en/product/sigma/c9999"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"A11CF55EE2A111EDAF7C0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.sigmaaldrich.com/GB/en/product/sigma/d9663"}},"2":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"A6645151E2A111EDAF7C0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.insightbio.com/productinfo/sc-296028/Santa%20Cruz%20Biotechnology"}},"3":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"A66451A2E2A111EDAF7C0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.sigmaaldrich.com/GB/en/product/sial/p6148"}},"4":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"82412586E2A111EDAF7C0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.sigmaaldrich.com/GB/en/product/sial/x100"}}}}

parent_collections.title: Do, Q. B. & Nebuloni, F. et al. (2023) A fluid walled microfluidic platform for human neuronal microcircuits and axotomy.
Do, Q. B. & Nebuloni, F. et al. (2023) A fluid walled microfluidic platform for human neuronal microcircuits and axotomy.

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.section: Generation of the corticostriatal pathway coculture on fluid-walled dumbbells
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"avdk8","text":"Fabricate the fluid-walled dumbbells on 6 cm culture dishes as described in step 1 of Protocol: Fabrication of fluid-walled dumbbells and generation of the human corticostriatal pathway","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":76,"length":6},{"style":"bold","offset":86,"length":99}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":86,"length":99}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"C4D6E4A9E2A111EDAF7C0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.protocols.io/private/88114D35E2A811EDAF7C0A58A9FEAC02"}}}}

steps.section: Generation of the corticostriatal pathway coculture on fluid-walled dumbbells
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5omp2","text":"Allow cells to be cultured on glass coverslips as described in Section: Establishment of Human Corticostriatal Pathway in Protocol: Fabrication of fluid-walled dumbbells and generation of the human corticostriatal pathway until relevant experimental timepoints for immunocytochemistry.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":63,"length":56},{"style":"bold","offset":122,"length":100}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":122,"length":99}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"995D6010E2A811ED9E5609A71AD569E1","url":"https://www.protocols.io/private/88114D35E2A811EDAF7C0A58A9FEAC02"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eqn1b","text":"At day 25 of the coculture, remove all cell media and FC40 by gentle pouring. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4a6d5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"d0mp4","text":"Wash the whole dish with PBS twice using P1000.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7e95h","text":"Fix cells by adding 2% PFA in PBS to each dish at room temperature for 20 mins.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"41ub2","text":"Remove PFA completely using a pipette.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6vmfd","text":"Wash thoroughly 3 times with PBS, at least 10 mins each.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4r3kp","text":"Incubate the coverslips in PBS for at least 1 hour at room temperature or at 4°C overnight.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1f5ji","text":"Perform antigen retrieval by adding 2 mL of 1x citrate buffer (pH 6.0) to each dish, and place the culture dish in a water bath at 80ºC for 5 mins.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"pdar","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8l4a8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":45,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"cphn5","text":"This step is time- and temperature-sensitive. ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"dfs87","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"39mp8","text":"Fluid can quickly dried out during the incubation - a generous amount of citrate buffer should be added. Longer incubation and/or higher temperature can damage the cell sample.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9hcbu","text":"Leave to incubate at room temperature for 10-20 mins.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3kv50","text":"Prepare blocking solution containing PBS with 10% Donkey Bovine Serum (NBS) and 0.1% Triton-X during the post-antigen retrieval incubation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9o3ko","text":"Remove the citrate buffer and add 1 mL of blocking solution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"73gju","text":"Leave to incubate at room temperature for 10 mins.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"94n9s","text":"Wash twice with PBS, at least 10 mins each.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"45k9o","text":"During previous washes, prepare the Primary Antibody Solution containing PBS with 10% Donkey Bovine Serum (NBS), supplemented with appropriate primary antibodies in their respective working concentrations. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"emrc6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"77bet","text":"The following primary antibodies (working concentration 1:250) were used in Do, Q. et al. (2023) for immunostaining: anti-DARPP32, anti-DARPP32, anti-MAP2, anti-GFP.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b759q","text":"Remove all the PBS from each well and add 80 mL of the Primary Antibody Solution.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2r7o9","text":"Leave to incubate overnight at 4°C.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2hjdc","text":"Remove all the Primary Antibody Solution and add fresh PBS.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bt7pc","text":"Wash thoroughly 3 times with PBS, at least 10 mins each.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ej8f7","text":"During the last wash, prepare Secondary Antibody Solution containing PBS with 10% Donkey Bovine Serum (NBS), supplemented with appropriate secondary antibodies and DAPI (4',6-Diamidino-2-Phenylindole, Dilactate) in their respective working concentrations.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b5sr8","text":"","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3qaq2","text":"The following secondary antibodies (working concentration 1:1000) were used in Do, Q. et al. (2023) for immunostaining: Alexa-Fluor 555 Mouse, Alexa-Fluor 648 Rabbit, Alexa Fluor 488 Chicken, and DAPI.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4hdts","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9gcg9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"5davo","text":"Keep pre-made solution wrapped in aluminium foil and/or keep away from direct light during incubation.","type":"align-justify"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5caus","text":"Remove all the PBS from each well and add 80 mL of the Secondary Antibody Solution.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"94kmc","text":"Leave to incubate at room temperature for 1-2 hours.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ahfm4","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"apul1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"fdc5o","text":"Keep cell plates wrapped in aluminium foil and/or keep away from direct light during incubation.","type":"align-justify"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fq0qm","text":"Once done, wash well with PBS.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"99m90","text":"Incubate the culture in generous amount of PBS Azide until imaging. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Immunostaining of corticostriatal culture on fluid-walled dumbbells
